scripts._:build:setup-git-repo-bare: mkdir -p ./dist/git-repo-bare.git && cd ./dist/git-repo-bare.git && git init --bare && git --bare update-server-info && mv hooks/post-update.sample hooks/post-update
scripts._:build:setup-git-repo-content: mkdir -p ./dist/git-repo-content && cp -r ./git-repo-content/* ./dist/git-repo-content && cd ./dist/git-repo-content && git init && git remote add repo ../git-repo-bare.git && git add . && git commit -m 'Accelerator dev commit' && git push repo main && cd ../git-repo-bare.git && git update-server-info
scripts.build:prod: pnpm run build && pnpm run test
